It was stormy and the 1waves were high when we saw the big ship.
A Japanese 2flag was flying from the ship’s 3mast.
The 4captain was on the ship with his men. They didn’t know it, but their lives were in danger.

We were 5pirates and we were planning to 6destroy their ship. Then we saw a boy who was swimming near us. While our ship was getting closer, he was making 7holes in it. Water started to come in! I took a big piece of wood and jumped into the ocean. At least I could 8float with the wood …
